title: How to know if my rap is really good - Quora

response.answer_text: To be blunt about it it isnt. To surpass your own confidence is to make good music. Make something where you dont have to ask if its good, and that makes it good. Remember music taste is an opinion. If you like your own rap (and you are the hardest fan to please) then its good. If no one else does, fuck them
